QuestData.Title: Missing Along the Way
QuestData.Description:
As we retreated from Val'Sharah, our company was briefly separated by a conflict with some satyrs at the border.
One of our own did not make it here- Mythandros' brother, Kalendros. I would like you to try and find him if you could.
Search the woods just before the bridge back into Val'Sharah.
QuestData.RewardText: How good of Mayruna to send help. I had nearly lost hope.
